name: Overview
data:
[{"id":"cdaf68c4-ad82-4be9-bf2f-f53b146ff87d","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Function: visit_Module","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"89659ed3-a697-4010-9be4-4696c6af1c2f","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Description
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"The ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" function acts as the "boot sequence" for analyzing a Python file. It is the first method called when the processor encounters a new file (represented as a Module node in the Abstract Syntax Tree). Its job is to set up the foundational structures—scopes, definitions, and call graph nodes—that the rest of the analysis will rely on.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"abf26659-79bd-4f35-81d7-e874fa4b4ca9","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Why this matters
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Before an analyzer can understand a function definition like ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"def my_func():","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", it needs to know "where" that function lives. Is it in the global scope? What module does it belong to? ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" establishes this "Root Scope." It essentially says, "I am now entering file X," and prepares the system to record everything found inside that file relative to this root container. Without this setup, subsequent definitions would be orphans with no context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b353bd89-7626-4bd4-8333-1c4a5a8341a3","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"How it works","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e3af5610-19ba-4b0a-a3ba-6f56557490e0","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Graph & Manager Registration:","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"31452a42-6f15-4611-816d-58e55dc54fb4","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It adds a node to the Call Graph (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"cg","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":") representing the module itself.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"dcf3ede0-99f0-4a13-ad39-833df3a1136f","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It updates the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"import_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to flag that this specific file is currently being processed.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b31d21bd-2d9c-4f0b-9872-d89d9c9ab9c8","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a Module object in the ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"module_manager","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", recording the file name and its line count (start to finish).","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"cdcb1990-136d-41b5-bce3-f0db9af8d660","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Root Definition:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" It checks if a definition already exists for this module string (e.g., ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"my_project.utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"). If not, it creates a global definition of type ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MOD_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (Module Definition).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"b2ab8ee4-feb9-4157-bb3c-7bde8e1b624c","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Scope Initialization (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"handle_module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"ff4db77d-35dc-44eb-a66f-899d4418756a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"scope_manager.handle_module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", which performs a preliminary scan of the file to identify all top-level functions and classes.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"0b2f4f7e-1ddb-4286-93a0-358b4ce06465","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This pre-scan is crucial because Python allows forward references in some contexts, and the analyzer needs a map of "what exists in this file" before it steps through line-by-line.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"e504eda9-361c-444b-83df-d242066286ac","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Item Registration (","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"iterate_mod_items","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"):","styles":{"bold":true}}],"children":[{"id":"9a61d9bf-aba8-4b09-846a-06cce381e8d6","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Using the list of items found in the pre-scan, it calls the inner helper ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iterate_mod_items","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"e0dc4af7-d70c-4fcf-8503-1d2d4f69d95d","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This helper creates formal definitions (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"FUN_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for functions, ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"CLS_DEF","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" for classes) and immediately adds them to the module's scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"44e46add-8215-4824-9e8d-0b0f0f751d2c","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"This ensures that even before the analyzer "visits" the line ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"class MyClass:","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":", a definition for ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"MyClass","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" already exists in the scope, ready to be filled in.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"b560a74a-24e1-4728-ac05-cb8233a50347","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Stack Entry:","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":" Finally, it pushes the module's definition onto the analysis stack (","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"pushStack","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":"), effectively entering the module's context.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"fadee5bb-f9de-4ecf-aebd-6dcaf3176128","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Example Scenario
","styles":{"bold":true}},{"type":"text","text":"Imagine analyzing a file ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" containing:","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"d1065fa8-cd43-435c-a6cc-2ff7c1db76b3","type":"codeBlock","props":{"language":"python"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"class Calculator:
    pass

def add(a, b):
    return a + b","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"5d163ed1-70ce-4ef0-9bd7-0d8455283ec1","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"When ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_Module","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" runs on ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils.py","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":":","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"1dc735ec-582f-46e9-b0de-cfc90aabec14","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It registers ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" in the global module list.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"a2d85955-d18b-4585-b873-6bee71a8b0dc","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It scans the file string and finds two top-level items: ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Calculator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (class) and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" (function).","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"db25530b-008d-4fee-acbc-40d1badce35d","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It calls ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"iterate_mod_items","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[{"id":"06aa685a-ebed-4b38-a8b7-3e023371a994","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a definition ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils.Calculator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and adds it to the scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"ad7f9e40-16a1-4b67-91c4-1891d944b74a","type":"bulletListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It creates a definition ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils.add","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and adds it to the scope.","styles":{}}],"children":[]}]},{"id":"dd071d7a-6da0-4917-82a7-7e9185feebcb","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"It pushes ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"math_utils","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" onto the stack.","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"4b15209c-7e91-4cde-ba60-1542076eafce","type":"numberedListItem","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[{"type":"text","text":"Only ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"after","styles":{"italic":true}},{"type":"text","text":" this setup does the visitor continue to process the specific lines inside, eventually hitting ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_ClassDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"visit_FunctionDef","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" to fill in the details of ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"Calculator","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":" and ","styles":{}},{"type":"text","text":"add","styles":{"code":true}},{"type":"text","text":".","styles":{}}],"children":[]},{"id":"bd3ca900-2d92-4df9-bc7d-74983fd9b856","type":"paragraph","props":{"backgroundColor":"default","textColor":"default","textAlignment":"left"},"content":[],"children":[]}]
